Ability.Description: Deals 911 to 1007 Death damage and applies State of Sloth to the enemy, reducing movement speed by 30% for 6s. Awards 1 Combo Point.

Rank.Description: Increases the damage of your non-physical attacks by 2%.
Increases the damage of your non-physical attacks by 4%.
Increases the damage of your non-physical attacks by 6%.
Reduces the damage you take from Fire and Death attacks by 2% and increases the damage of your attacks by 2%.
Reduces the damage you take from Fire and Death attacks by 4% and increases the damage of your attacks by 4%.
Reduces the damage you take from Fire and Death attacks by 6% and increases the damage of your attacks by 6%.

Deals additional Fire damage per Combo Point.

Rank.Description: Your Hellfire Blades and Smoldering Blades buff you for 15 seconds when they proc, increasing your damage by 3%.
Your Hellfire Blades and Smoldering Blades buff you for 15 seconds when they proc, increasing your damage by 5%.
Increases the damage of Dusk Strike and Twilight Force by 5%. Reduces the Energy cost of Primal Strike by 1.
Increases the damage of Dusk Strike and Twilight Force by 10%. Reduces the Energy cost of Primal Strike by 2.

Ability.Description: Dusk Strike and Twilight Force do not cost energy. Lasts 10s.

Rank.Description: If the enemy is suffering from the effect of Fiery Spike, your Blazing Strike and Flame Thrust have a 6.6% chance per Combo Point to cast Fiery Spike onto them and generate an extra Combo Point.
If the enemy is suffering from the effect of Fiery Spike, your Blazing Strike and Flame Thrust have a 13.2% chance per Combo Point to cast Fiery Spike onto them and generate an extra Combo Point.
If the enemy is suffering from the effect of Fiery Spike, your Blazing Strike and Flame Thrust have a 20% chance per Combo Point to cast Fiery Spike onto them and generate an extra Combo Point.

Ability.Description: Deals 4917 to 5435 Death damage and casts Fiery Spike onto the target. Awards 2 Combo Points.

Rank.Description: Increases the damage from your weapon enchantments by 30%.
Increases the damage from your weapon enchantments by 60%.
Increases the damage from your weapon enchantments by 90%.

You have a 33% chance to retain heat for 30 seconds each time a damaging ability that generates Combo Points is used, increasing damage done by 3%. When this effect is applied 5 times, your next Finisher deals 30% more damage and removes the effect.

You have a 66% chance to retain heat for 30 seconds each time a damaging ability that generates Combo Points is used, increasing damage done by 3%. When this effect is applied 5 times, your next Finisher deals 30% more damage and removes the effect.

You have a 100% chance to retain heat for 30 seconds each time a damaging ability that generates Combo Points is used, increasing damage done by 3%. When this effect is applied 5 times, your next Finisher deals 30% more damage and removes the effect.
Your Blazing Strike, Flame Thrust, Dusk Strike and Twilight Force deal 2% more damage and an additional 10% more damage if the enemy's health is below 30%.
Your Blazing Strike, Flame Thrust, Dusk Strike and Twilight Force deal 4% more damage and an additional 20% more damage if the enemy's health is below 30%.
Your Blazing Strike, Flame Thrust, Dusk Strike and Twilight Force deal 6% more damage and an additional 30% more damage if the enemy's health is below 30%.

Increases the maximum stack size of Fiery Spike by 2. Increases the damage of Fiery Spike by 30%.

Ability.Description: Roots and deals 4322 Death damage over 4s. Applies Nightrage to the Rogue, increasing damage done by Blazing Strike and Flame Thrust by 20% for 60s. Awards 2 Combo Points.

Rank.Description: Your Blazing Strike, Flame Thrust and Flame Blitz cause the enemy to burn for additional Fire damage equal to 100% of your weapon damage over 4s.
Your Blazing Strike, Flame Thrust and Flame Blitz cause the enemy to burn for additional Fire damage equal to 200% of your weapon damage over 4s.
